items.text: short of a length wide outside off, chopped on the rise to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: full and in at middle stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, punched on the up to the bowler
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on off stump, tapped on the up towards mid-off, who loses his footing as he runs in for a half-chance
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, tapped to cover off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Guptill, no run

items.text: run-out chance fluffed! Oh that's poor cricket from the batsmen first, and then Bangladesh in the field. Length at leg stump, tucked to deep square's right. Guptill is not ready for the second and responds late. The throw is released late and with no power. Two bounces to the bowler, who is in front of stumps and misses as he looks to flick this onto the stumps at the non-striker's
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 2 runs

items.text: length at the stumps, tapped through square leg
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: shot. Full, hooping in at middle stump. Nice stride into it, full face offered, and whistles past the umpire's right ear
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, FOUR runs

items.text: full outside off, mistimed drive on the up to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: misfield gives them four extra runs. Full on off stump, driven firmly to mid-off's left where Mahmudullah gets in a terrible position. On his backside as he sticks out a lazy left hand at this
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, FOUR runs

items.text: short and wide, cut straight to point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length ball skidding in at middle stump. Hurriedly tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length outside off, backs away and taps to sweeper's left
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, flicked to midwicket's right
items.postText: Wilfred Hickens: "This is NZ last ODI series before the World Cup. Though the coach won't say it publicly, NZ first choice team is playing this very game. The only question is who are the four other players to support them?"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, looks to drive on the up, gets an inside edge into the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, backs away and cuts to mid-off
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length at off stump, hurriedly pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length and in at middle stump, tapped to midwicket's right off the back foot
items.postText: Nitish: "@Varun: I understand that Nicholls is an interim replacement for Munro for the opener's slot and this is only his third innings as an opener. But do NZ have a credible medium--long term replacement at the moment ?" --- George Worker comes to mind immediately
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, no run

items.text: length on off stump, driven on the rise to mid-off
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Nicholls, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, nervous half-stride as he realises this is a legbreak sliding in from Sabbir. Inside edge onto pad
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: another legbreak slider. Middle stump. Pushed into the leg side off the front foot
items.postText:
Change in comms, here is Vishal again.

Andy: "Astle or Sodhi is a big decision for second spinner, the will probably take Southee, Munro and another batsman"

Karthick: "@ Wilfred Hickens : My cards will be with Southee, Sodhi, Munro and a reserve WK batsmen who is in good form."

Jono: "Wilfred Hickens I agree, this is NZs best lineup for the world cup. "
items.shortText: Sabbir Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.preText: Thanks, Varun. The batsmen are having a banana during the drinks break, NZ not looking flustered in this moderate chase. Here's Mehidy
items.text: turning in from off, driven down to long-on for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: towards Nicholls' pads and he tucks it wide of short fine leg for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Nicholls, 1 run
